name: FormValidator.Models
comment:
The Form Validator component models.

@docs Form, Field, Validators, Validator, Values, Value, Errors, Error

aliases.name: Error
aliases.comment: The corresponding error message of an invalid field value.

aliases.name: Errors
aliases.comment: The corresponding error messages of an invalid field value(s).

aliases.name: Field
aliases.comment:
The form field, identified by unique key, which stores a value, validators of that value,
and validation errors (if any).
aliases.type: { key : key, value : String.String, validators : FormValidator.Models.Validators, errors : FormValidator.Models.Errors }

aliases.name: Form
aliases.comment: The form model which stores a list of fields for input and validation.

aliases.name: Validator
aliases.comment: A field validator which evaluates to an error string (invalid) or nothing at all (valid).

aliases.name: Validators
aliases.comment: A list of validators for a field.

aliases.name: Value
aliases.comment: A field value to be validated.

aliases.name: Values
aliases.comment: A list of field values to be validated.

name: FormValidator.Patterns
comment:
The Form Validator regular expression patterns.

@docs blank, email

values.name: blank
values.comment: Answer regular expression for blank string.

values.name: email
values.comment: Answer regular expression for email address.

name: FormValidator.Validator

values.name: fieldErrors
values.comment: Answer all errors for a field.

values.name: fieldValue
values.comment: Answer single field value.

values.name: fieldValues
values.comment: Answer multiple field values.

values.name: init
values.comment: Initialize a new form field.

values.name: isFieldInvalid
values.comment: Answer if field is invalid.

values.name: isFormInvalid
values.comment: Answer if form is invalid.

values.name: resetField
values.comment: Reset field value(s) and errors to initial state.

values.name: resetForm
values.comment: Reset field values and errors for entire form to initial state.

values.name: updateAndValidateValue
values.comment:
**DEPRECATED: Will be removed in 2.0.0. Use `updateValueAndValidate` instead.**

Update field value and validate it.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Value -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: updateAndValidateValues
values.comment:
**DEPRECATED: Will be removed in 2.0.0. Use `updateValuesAndValidate` instead.**

Update field values and validate them.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Values -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: updateValue
values.comment: Update single field value without validation.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Value -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: updateValueAndValidate
values.comment: Update field value and validate it.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Value -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: updateValues
values.comment: Update multiple field values without validation.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Values -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: updateValuesAndValidate
values.comment: Update field values and validate them.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Values -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key

values.name: validateField
values.comment: Validate field.

values.name: validateForm
values.comment: Validate form (including all fields).

name: FormValidator.Validators

values.name: isBetween
values.comment: Validates if value is within minimum and maximum *inclusive* range.

values.name: isBlank
values.comment: Validates if value is blank.

values.name: isEmail
values.comment: Validates if value is an email address.

values.name: isEmpty
values.comment: Validates if value is empty.

values.name: isExcluded
values.comment: Validates if value is excluded from list.

values.name: isFloat
values.comment: Validates if value is a float.

values.name: isGreaterThan
values.comment: Validates if value is greater than minimum.

values.name: isGreaterThanEqualTo
values.comment: Validates if value is greater than or equal to minimum.

values.name: isIncluded
values.comment: Validates if value is included in list.

values.name: isInteger
values.comment: Validates if value is an integer.

values.name: isLengthBetween
values.comment: Validates if value length is between minimum and maximum *inclusive* range.

values.name: isLengthGreaterThan
values.comment: Validates if value length is greater than minimum.

values.name: isLengthGreaterThanEqualTo
values.comment: Validates if value length is greater than or equal to minimum.

values.name: isLengthLessThan
values.comment: Validates if value length is less than maximum.

values.name: isLengthLessThanEqualTo
values.comment: Validates if value length is less than or equal to maximum.

values.name: isLessThan
values.comment: Validates if value is less than maximum.

values.name: isLessThanEqualTo
values.comment: Validates if value is less than or equal to maximum.

name: FormValidator.Views

values.name: error
values.comment: View field error (if any) as a list item.

values.name: errors
values.comment: View field errors (if any) as an unordered list.

values.name: field
values.comment: View field with errors (if any). To be used as a wrapper around field DOM elements.
values.type: key -> FormValidator.Models.Form key -> List.List String.String -> List.List (Html.Html message) -> Html.Html message
